value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01826v1", "title": "The properties of general Fourier partial sums of functions $f \\in C_L$", "summary": "In this paper, we investigated the Fourier partial sums with respect to\ngeneral orthonormal systems when the function $f$ belongs to some\ndifferentiable class of functions", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-02T15:33:13Z"}
